exportMessage1: The exported file will contain the data
informationsSectionText1: You can only export users with the Facility Manager role. Attempting to export users with a different role will fail part or all of the operation
informationsSectionText2: You can export lecturers and student users from your facility. Attempting to export users with other roles or from other facilities will fail part or all of the operation
noExtensionError: To export users, first select an extension!
notFullExportError: One or more users could not be exported
userNotPermittedError: The user is not authorized to perform the export
